data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during TROMP cruise from Nore to Barbados started at 1800-07-22
Ship: Tromp (4th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Nore - Barbados, 1st Observer: Terence O'Neil (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 50G 1039BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
